h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Bluebridge Romance Location
content: The Bluebridge Romance Drink can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West. From the North Shore of the Bitter Lake Shrine in the Bitter Lake, follow the coast along the left. Eventually, you will pass through a red gate. Walk all the way to the back of the area to the house in the distance to find the Bluebridge Romance Drink sitting in on the side of the lake to the left of the house.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bluebridge_Romance.md', within the main section titled 'Bluebridge Romance', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Bluebridge Romance Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Bluebridge Romance Drink can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West. From the North Shore of the Bitter Lake Shrine in the Bitter Lake, follow the coast along the left. Eventually, you will pass through a red gate. Walk all the way to the back of the area to the house in the distance to find the Bluebridge Romance Drink sitting in on the side of the lake to the left of the house.
